name: Micropublish
description: A Micropub client that you can use to create, update, delete and undelete content on your Micropub-enabled site.

COOKIE_SECRET.description: A long, secure, (ideally) random string used to secure data stored in the user's cookie.

FORCE_SSL.description: Enable redirect from http:// to https:// - highly recommended if no reverse proxy is used which would take care of TLS termination
